job.title: Machine Learning Engineer (Computer Vision))
job.description: pMachine Learning Engineer  TrueFootageppTrueFootage is looking for a machine learning engineer that is motivated to transform an industrynbsp TrueFootage is a real estate data and analytics company looking to bring the next level of efficiency to the real estate transaction process by superior quality of information accuracy and automationnbsp We take pride in every detail in the process and heavily believe in continuous learning consistent improvement and getting resultsnbspppbrppstrongThe TeamstrongppYou would be a core member of the machine learning team at the company we are looking for someone who can work through tough ambiguous problems is comfortable with discriminative and generative techniques is relentless about predictive accuracy leads by example can crank on a codebase and is relentless about pleasing their customers and usersnbspppbrppstrongWhat you will work onstrongppYou will own the development deployment and management of all of our algorithms that power the company from basic tagging and classification to complex geometry and computer visionnbsppulliLead the development and enhancement of custom machine learning algorithms focusing on graph theory complex geometry and computer visionliliLead the development of complex data pipelines to support production models and algorithmsliliLead the development of our labeling and annotation strategiesliliDevelop algorithms and techniques that can deploy into production with a focus on driving simplicity and ease of use to our end usersliliDevelop a working understanding of the business and what the end users are trying to accomplish and how that translates into math and algorithmsliulpbrppstrongWho we are looking forstrongppWe are looking for a machine learning engineer who wants to own the development of algorithms that power an entire companypulliStrong knowledge of custom model and algorithm development beyond running and modifying examples onlineliliStrong understanding of generative vs discriminative methods and when to use eachliliStrong knowledge of computer vision neural network variations complex geometry and graph theory data labeling and annotation strategiesliliStrong knowledge of predictive accuracy and what drives variations in model errorsliliStrong knowledge of distributed systems and accelerated compute infrastructures GPU TPUliliStrong understanding of software development principles and best practicesliliStrong knowledge of model training runtime and performance optimizationsliliStrong knowledge of Python and R programmingliliStrong knowledge of Tensorflow KerasliliStrong knowledge of CCGolangliliStrong understanding of data visualization techniques in 2D and 3D spacesliliYou are great in ambiguous situations and prefer it to be that wayliliYou are willing to take responsibility for you work and have a heightened sense of ownershipliliYou iterate quickly believe in constant and consistent improvement and continuous learningliliExcellent communication skills and take pride in your ability to communicate and distill complex topics into succinct explanationsliulpbrp
